body.name: SELOWEA Hidden Camera Detectors, Anti Spy, Car GPS Tracker, Portable RF Signal Finder, Bug Sweeper, Listening Device Detector for Airbnb Office Car Hotel Travel
features: 【Newest Technology Bug Detectors】With this bug detector, it's effortless to locate hidden cameras, wireless listening devices and GPS trackers.

【Easy to Use and Carry】Just choose related modes, then sweep the device throughout a room. When it detects any suspicious device, it will alert or vibrate. With a compact card design, you can transport this anti-spy device in a purse, carry-on bag, or pocket when traveling.

【8 Levels Adjustable Sensitivity 】Our Bug Sweeper device has 8 levels of sensitivity to choose from, the signal detection range is 2 inch-50ft, the higher the sensitivity, the larger the detectable range, and you are free to choose the appropriate sensitivity. As the probe is at the top, please try to align the probe with the detection orientation when using it.

【4 Detector Modes 】Our Bug Finder has wireless signal detection mode, magnetic signal detection mode, hidden camera detection mode, and infrared camera detection mode. Wireless signal detection mainly detects mobile phones and wireless devices. magnetic signal detection mainly detects GPS trackers. Hidden camera detection allows you to easily find the location of the pinhole camera. infrared camera detection allows you to find a camera with night vision.
【100% Customer Satisfaction 】We supply 30-Day Money Back and 180-Day Free Replacement If you are not satisfied with this spy camera detector.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Comprehensive Detection: The detector is equipped to identify a range of wireless signals, including hidden cameras, RF signals, wireless microphones, wireless cameras, and GPS locators. Its advanced technology ensures thorough coverage for enhanced security.User-Friendly Operation: With a user-friendly interface, this wireless signal detector is easy to operate, making it accessible for both professionals and individuals without technical expertise.Portable and Compact: Designed for convenience, the compact size of the detector allows for on-the-go use. Carry it discreetly in your pocket or bag, ensuring that you're always prepared to protect your privacy.

Ideal Scenarios and User Profile: Personal Spaces: Perfect for ensuring privacy in personal spaces such as bedrooms, bathrooms, or changing rooms, where hidden cameras or microphones may compromise personal security.Professional Settings: Useful in professional environments, such as offices and boardrooms, to safeguard against unauthorized surveillance and eavesdropping.Travel Security: Essential for individuals traveling to unfamiliar locations, providing peace of mind against potential tracking devices and hidden cameras in hotel rooms.Public Spaces: Useful in public spaces like cafes, libraries, or public transportation, protecting against potential threats posed by wireless surveillance devices.Security Enthusiasts: Ideal for security enthusiasts, investigators, and individuals who prioritize maintaining their privacy and want to ensure their personal spaces are free from unauthorized surveillance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and stylish looking detector
reviews.reviewText: Shipped quickly and just in time for my trip! I really like the fact that it's compact so it's easy to take with me when I travel a lot. It is very easy to use and the batteries last a long time. The sensitivity can be adjusted as needed. I recommend this product because it is well made and works well with just a little practice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad at all!!
reviews.reviewText: Recently, I went on a trip. I used this amazing product.This smart bug, GPS, and camera detector proved effective in identifying potential privacy threats. Its compact design and user-friendly interface make it accessible for users of varying tech expertise. The real-time detection and alert features enhance security, offering peace of mind in diverse settings. However, occasional false positives were noted, requiring users to discern between genuine threats and benign signals. Overall, a valuable tool for maintaining personal privacy in an increasingly connected world. A few flaw! Instructions were not very clear but you can try to test around. It is smaller than what I expected. May be some people like it better because it is portable. Overall, it is valued on what it is worth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect product! Very reliable!
reviews.reviewText: This device is very useful as I often go on vacation and always worry that they have hidden cameras in the room. I just don't like being looked at. I tested it and it works great. I slept peacefully, knowing no one was watching me. This is definitely a very convenient device to own and use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and compact !
reviews.reviewText: Arrived very quick and it came in with a charger cable. I charged it up before using and took less than 1 hour to fully charge. I’m thrilled with its performance. The compact design makes it easy to carry anywhere, and its ability to detect WiFi cameras is a game-changer. Five stars for the peace of mind it provides!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price, I'm very happy with it.
reviews.reviewText: left a deep impression on me. It's very easy to use and gives me peace of mind in different places like my office or hotel room. In fact, it can find hidden cameras and GPS trackers; it's small and easy to carry, making it a must-have for anyone who cares about privacy. highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easier to identify potential hidden cameras
reviews.reviewText: They are not limited to just finding hidden cameras, they also serve as an effective anti-spy and bug sweeper. This means that they can detect a wide range of surveillance devices, including hidden cameras, listening devices, and even car GPS trackers. This all-in-one functionality provides peace of mind, knowing that you can detect and protect your privacy from various threats.the Hidden Camera Detectors exceeded my expectations. They have a reliable RF signal finder that can detect wireless signals emitted by surveillance devices. The detectors are equipped with advanced technology to ensure accurate and efficient detection. The adjustable sensitivity settings allow for customization based on the specific environment, making it easier to pinpoint potential threats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's compact, looks great, has easy-to-follow instructions, and is very light to carry around. The unit looks well built and looking forward to using it on my next trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I had wanted to try a camera/bug detector for a while, and this one was surprisingly compact and effective. I tried it in my home and was able to find cameras and Wi-Fi very easily. I tried it in my hotel room, and I wasn’t able to find anything, so I felt very confident that there was nothing present that was spying on me. There is also a useful flashlight attached that is very handy for looking into dark spots.
